head.title: Metro Business Briefing; COMMUNITY NEWS ON THE WEB

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: Metro Business Briefing; COMMUNITY NEWS ON THE WEB

abstract.p: Two Manhattan community newspapers, Our Town and West Side Spirit, both owned by News Communications Inc, begin providing neighborhood news and cultural listings to EdificeRex.com, Web site that offers news and building services guides to residents of about 250 luxury apartment buildings in Manhattan (S)

block.p: Two Manhattan community newspapers, Our Town and West Side Spirit, both owned by News Communications Inc., began providing neighborhood news and cultural listings yesterday to EdificeRex.com, a Web site that offers news and building services guides to the residents of about 250 luxury apartment buildings in Manhattan. The advertising staffs of the newspapers and EdificeRex plan to package print and online advertising jointly. The publisher and editor in chief of the newspapers, Tom Allon, said, ''This will give them a sampling of what we have.'' Peter Price, the chief executive of EdificeRex.com, said that RexOffice.com, a similar site owned by the EdificeRex for commercial buildings, planned to join with Crain's New York Business for business-oriented local news within a month.

Two Manhattan community newspapers, Our Town and West Side Spirit, both owned by News Communications Inc., began providing neighborhood news and cultural listings yesterday to EdificeRex.com, a Web site that offers news and building services guides to the residents of about 250 luxury apartment buildings in Manhattan. The advertising staffs of the newspapers and EdificeRex plan to package print and online advertising jointly. The publisher and editor in chief of the newspapers, Tom Allon, said, ''This will give them a sampling of what we have.'' Peter Price, the chief executive of EdificeRex.com, said that RexOffice.com, a similar site owned by the EdificeRex for commercial buildings, planned to join with Crain's New York Business for business-oriented local news within a month.
